text: (nabiye! ek dinayak gæna oba ovunta matak kara denu). edinadi mema bhumiya venas kara venat akarayaka bhumiyak bavata pat kara harinu æta. ahasda e akarayatamayi. ovun (tama tamange sthanayanhi sita) ikut vi (siyallanvama) yatahat pahat kara ekama deviyan vana ema allahge sannidhanayehi ekræs vanu æta
